trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked clear go to x: (50) y: (0) set pen size to (3) set pen color to (0) pen down repeat (6) move (50) steps turn cw (120) degrees move (50) steps turn ccw (60) degrees end change pen color by (50) repeat (6) turn cw (60) degrees move (50) steps end pen up

when green flag clicked clear set pen size to (3) go to x: (50) y: (0) point in direction (0 v) repeat (6) triangle :: custom move (50) steps turn ccw (60) degrees change pen color by (30) end
define triangle pen down repeat (3) turn ccw ((360) / (3)) degrees move (50) steps end pen up

when green flag clicked clear go to x: (0) y: (0) set pen size to (3) set pen color to (0) point in direction (90 v) pen down repeat (3) move (150) steps turn ccw (120) degrees end pen up go to x: (75) y: (-45) turn ccw (120) degrees change pen color by (50) pen down repeat (3) move (150) steps turn cw (120) degrees end pen up
